titles.title: Stop Wasting Taxpayer Money on Cuba Broadcasting Act
To discontinue Radio Marti and Television Marti broadcasts to Cuba.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/27/2015--Introduced. Stop Wasting Taxpayer Money on Cuba Broadcasting Act
Repeals the Radio Broadcasting to Cuba Act and the Television Broadcasting to Cuba Act (thus eliminating Voice of America: Radio/Television Marti broadcasts to Cuba).
